edu.wpi.disco.lang

Class Utterance

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cetask.Task
      • edu.wpi.cetask.Decomposition.Step
        • edu.wpi.disco.lang.Utterance
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Nested, Ok, Propose.Global, Say

    public abstract class Utterance
extends Decomposition.Step
    Base class for utterances. See edu.wpi.disco.lang package for extensions.

        public boolean interpret(Plan contributes,
                boolean continuation)
        Description copied from class: Task
        Update engine state based on occurrence of this task.
        Overrides:
        interpret in class Task
        Parameters:
        contributes - plan to which this occurrence has been found to contribute or null if no such plan could be found
        continuation - true if contributes started before this task matched
        Returns:
        false iff this task is unexplained
